title: Tom Segura Returns + Dermot Mulroney || The Sexiest Man on the Planet has been Found
description:
Subscribe, Rate, Share, and Leave a Review! Subscribe to our youtube: barstool.link/KFCRADIO - Halloween costumes - Dipping our toe in the water with guys who dressed as Kourtney and Meghan Fox - Paulina Gretzkys friend is the sexiest man alive - Steve Buscemi is the man - Week 8 NFL Recap - Jacqed Up - The Blink 182 lyrics are actually WHAT - Top 5 Worst Halloween Candies - Video Voicemails: - jerking off in the shower - potcake puppy palace - mom's blessing -02:09:08 - Tom Segura on cars, Berts long balls, his awesome kid, Adriana Chechik and much more -03:11:34 - Dermot Mulroney on being Irish, New Girl, Friends and much more. Dermot's new movie Hard Luck Love Song will be available on PVOD on November 9th. Let us know what you think on Twitter: @KFCRadio @KFCBarstool @Feitsbarstool @JNics415 @nickhammy5 @Joshua__DM @macczack21 @mikeypavss


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
